Class User

java.lang.Object
Player
User
public class User extends Player
This class represents a human player (user) in a game of Crazy Eights.

  • Field Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Field
    Description

    Message to print when user attempts to draw a Card, but is already holding a playable Card in their hand.
    static String
    SELECT_CARD_FROM_HAND_PROMPT
    Message to print when prompting User to enter Card number.

    • User

      public User​(String theName, Scanner in)
      Create a new human player with the specified name and an empty hand.
      Parameters:
      theName - the name of the human player
      in - the Scanner to use to collect input from the user

  • Method Details

    • makeMove

      public Card makeMove​(Game crazyEight, Card top)
      Allow the user to make a move (take one turn). If user's hand contains a playable card, they must select a card from their hand and "play" it to end their move. If no card currently in the user's hand is playable, then they must draw from the drawpile until a playable card is drawn, and "play" that one. Makes use of named constants above to match expected message formatting.
      Specified by:
      makeMove in class Player
      Parameters:
      crazyEight - gives access to the "draw pile"
      top - the top of the "discard pile"
      Returns:
      the card played by the user
